metadata.Title: CVE-2021-22227 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.Description: A reflected cross-site script vulnerability in GitLab before versions13.11.6, 13.12.6 and 14.0.2 allowed an attacker to send a malicious link toa victim and trigger actions on their behalf if they clicked it

criterions.comment: gitlab: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
